item.title: Daily Rundown 04/25/2021
item.description: I finally started digging into my backlog of articles to research, which mostly consists of a bunch of Google Chrome tabs. Below are some interesting reads: Things to consider if you want to launch a crypto token Creating a smart contract from another smart contract Wrapped BAN? It’s coming! CryptomonKeys collectible NFTs via Alien Worlds reddit Why should your business accept $NANO Easy Amazon EC2 Instance Comparison TickerRain does sentiment analysis related to stocks on reddit Freqtrade, open source crypto trading bot The Coin Perspective, if other tokens had Bitcoin’s market cap
item.content:
I finally started digging into my backlog of articles to research, which mostly consists of a bunch of Google Chrome tabs. Below are some interesting reads:

  • Things to consider if you want to launch a crypto token
  • Creating a smart contract from another smart contract
  • Wrapped BAN? It’s coming!
  • CryptomonKeys collectible NFTs via Alien Worlds reddit
  • Why should your business accept $NANO
  • Easy Amazon EC2 Instance Comparison
  • TickerRain does sentiment analysis related to stocks on reddit
  • Freqtrade, open source crypto trading bot
  • The Coin Perspective, if other tokens had Bitcoin’s market cap
